entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain at times heavy or snow. Temperature rising to 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to rain at times heavy this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm except 20 cm inland. Rainfall amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming south 60 gusting to 80 near midnight. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Fog patches. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 13 January 2023
